welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Savannah, where southern charm meets rich history! Get ready to soak in the beauty of our cobblestone streets, historic homes, and vibrant culture. We hope you have a fantastic time exploring all that our city has to offer."

restaurants.name: Yummy Cafe
restaurants.description: Yummy Cafe is a chinese restaurant located in Savannah.

restaurants.name: Firehouse Subs
restaurants.description: Firehouse Subs is a fast food restaurant located in Savannah.

restaurants.name: Zaxby's
restaurants.description: Zaxby's is a fried chicken joint located in Savannah.

restaurants.name: Bojangles' Famous Chicken 'n Biscuits
restaurants.description: Bojangles' Famous Chicken 'n Biscuits is a restaurant located in Savannah.

restaurants.name: Dunkin'
restaurants.description: Dunkin' is a café located in Savannah.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hunter AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Hunter AAF Airport is reserved for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: This concourse serves Delta and United Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: This concourse serves American Airlines and JetBlue flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
